description.p: Opens the editor for a field, even if the field is not visible in the current FormView.

argument.name: fieldName
argument.description: The field in the FormView to invoke the editor.

argument.name: overrideSettings
argument.description: Override settings. The override settings are the same as you would define in the FormView.

discussion.p: The *[js:formViewInvokeEditor()]* method opens an editor for a field in a FormView. The field does not need to be visible in the FormView in order to open it in an Editor for editing.
Optional override settings can be defined for the Editor when it is opened. The override settings are the same override settings you would define for a field in the FormView builder.
